DOC.brief_summary: A double-blind , placebo control study conduct single study site . Evaluating role systemic antihistamine therapy reduction adverse effect associate topical 5-aminolevulinic acid photodynamic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Trial Evaluating Role Systemic Antihistamine Therapy Reduction Adverse Effects Associated With Topical 5-aminolevulinic Acid Photodynamic Therapy
